column1: I will provide you with many descriptions of photos separated by dots. The photos were all taken in same area. I want you to generate a coherent text, not a list, to describe the place given the descriptions.
You will get descriptions of photos separated by dots. The photos were all taken in same area. I want you to generate a text, not a list, describing the place.
Given many short description generate a coherent text about a certain area.
Given many short description generate a short coherent text about a certain area.
Provide a short summary given the descriptions.
